kalaniya gurukula widyalaya ha galla richmand widyalaya athara pawathwu ardha awasan purwa krikat tharagaye siduwu akramikathawaya pilibandawa pulul parikshanayak pawathwana lesa gurukula widyalayiya kridakayange mawpiyo krida amathi si. bi. rathnayaka mahathagen illa siti.mema akramikathawaya pilibandawa pulul parikshanayak kara sadharana thiranayak labena thek mema 13 wanida pawathwimata niyamitha krikat tharagaya nathara karana lesath owhu illa sitithi.pasal krikat sangamaya magin nikuth karana chayarupa sahitha handunumpathe athi chayarupa galawa ee sandaha wenath chayarupa alawimen pasal krikat sangamaya hallu kota kridawata waradi aadarshayan laba di athi bawath mawpiyo pawasathi..

ihatha aakarayata prathama manushya thulin da danuma ha buddhiyehi awashyathawaya awadharanaya kala dewiyan pahala kala prathama dewa wakyaya magin da awadharanaya kale adhyapanaye awashyathawaya ha ehi wadagathkamayi.

anith prasthara deka anuwa bauddha anupathaya padiwi nathi nisa ha samanayen ese wima(kristhiyani/muslim aya buddhagama walada ganima) salakiya yuthu mattamakin sidu nowana nisa(mage athdakim anuwa ), kristhiyani aya buddhagama walada ganima yana hethuwa bahara kirimata sidu wenawa.

paripalakayeku wisin kalin niyama karana lada pawarum gananawakata awadhanaya yomu karana athara, owunge dura aatha pradeshayen pitatha sitina pradesha wala hakiyawak nomathi wiya hakiya.

duka nathi kirime thathu elesinma dakiyi.
hitha ton ganak barata daneddi as maha hudakalawaka alila galila unne wage wagak nathiwa.
onna kastiyata aluth kathawak aragena adath aawa me tikema liyanna bari wuna appa.....sinhala kotanna giyama epa wenawa kollo....kohoma wunath pasal kale wechcha sundara kathawak oon ada akuru kala..

ee ithihasaya wenas kirime aramunin yuthuwa mahela jayawardhanage kandayama ada thewani ekdina gatumata piwiseyi.shri lankawe abhiyogaya wanuye owun dan piwisa sitina jayagrahi mawathe thawa duratath randi sitima thahawuru kara ganimaya.

siprasge ‘janamatha suduwe da in ikbithi athiwu parajaye da ekama shakya pa්rathiwipakaya wanu aththe, “ga්risiye goldan don namathi fasist pakshaya thawaduratath shakthimath wima”ya yi warufakis gadiyan puwath pathata kiya sitiye ya.

wikunum saha alewi katayuthu piliba`da samanyadhikarini shehara da silwa mahathmiya awadharanaya karamin kiya sitiye sarthakathwaya yanu manasika kridawak bawath, obata kisiyam deyak awashya nam ee sa`daha apa kapawimen ema ilakkaya jayagatha haki bawathya. 2011 wasaredi 16% ka wardhanayak samagin rupiyal biliyana 7.1 ka warshika dala warika aadayamak ipayu janashakthi rakshana samagama pasugiya wasara kihipaya ha sasandimedi ihalama wardhanayak wartha kara atha.
ese ma minisa wisin sakasaganna lada arutha ho aramuna ho agaya ho pilibandawa kisi ma padanamak natha.
